title: Walk to Anything - Downtown 1 Bed
posting_body: This is located in the heart of Downtown Austin, with a 2 minute walk to the River, and nature trail.
4 minute walk to grocery.
Courtyard pool, 24 hr fitness center, gated garage parking, valet dry cleaning service, business center and conference room, rooftop grill station.
Industrial feel apartment with concrete walls for sound proofing, massive floorplans, patios/balconies, washer/dryer in-unit.
